events: Player picked up the torch from the wall
Player examined the cavern with the torch
Player discovered a metal object near the western passage
Player noticed luminescent fungi in the cavern
Player descended deeper into the cave
Player discovered an ancient silver coin
Player examined the coin, noting its unusual weight and hand-struck appearance
Player observed images of a face and a mountain/pyramid on the coin
Player bagged the ancient silver coin
Player descended deeper into the cave
